5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa’eed said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Pray Witr before morning comes.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ وِتْرٍ، أَوْ نَسِيَهُ
chapter.eng-name: One who sleeps and misses Witr, or forgets it
